description: This file is a C++ source file (AppGateway.cpp) for the plugin AppGateway, part of a larger project related to an app gateway implementation. It appears to contain core implementations for the plugin functionality, including classes and methods related to app gateway processing. The file is part of a build process that compiles multiple C++ source files into object files.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class representing the app gateway plugin logic and core interface implementation.

classes.name: AppGatewayImplementation
classes.description: Implementation class for core app gateway functionalities.

classes.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation
classes.description: Class handling responder-specific logic within the app gateway plugin.

classes.name: Resolver
classes.description: Class responsible for resolving dependencies or configurations.

classes.name: Module
classes.description: Defines module-level initialization and setup for the plugin.

methods.name: AppGateway::Start
methods.description: Starts the app gateway plugin operations.

methods.name: AppGatewayImplementation::Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the implementation details of the app gateway.

methods.name: AppGatewayResponderImplementation::Respond
methods.description: Handles responses in the responder implementation.

methods.name: Module::Load
methods.description: Loads the module and performs initial setup.
